item.title: Noem says Trump can deport who he wants, botches what 'habeas corpus' means
item.description: Kristi Noem spoke after White House aide Stephen Miller floated suspending the writ of habeas corpus for migrants.

item.title: Elon Musk says he will spend 'a lot less' on future campaign donations
item.description: Elon Musk, the CEO of Tesla and SpaceX and the face of DOGE, has been a major presence in D.C. since President Donald Trump's electoral victory.

item.title: Trump fails to convince 'SALT' caucus to back tax bill
item.description: President Trump told House Republicans, 'Don’t f--- around with Medicaid,' in a close-door meeting on a major tax bill he wants passed this week.

item.title: Trump warns House Republicans, 'Don’t f--- around with Medicaid'
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson wants a major tax bill passed before Memorial Day. GOP debates over the SALT deduction, Medicaid and deficits could thwart ...

item.title: Trump to press Putin to end 'bloodbath' in Ukraine
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump will speak separately with Vladimir Putin and Volodymyr Zelenskyy in hopes of ending the "bloodbath" in Ukraine.
